contact-us__subtitle:

what-you-get__web_item_two: A variety of statistics on family progress.
what-you-get__web_item_three: View history of submission and actions taken.
what-you-get__web_item_five:
Define subjects in which you will want
to work with each child individually.
what-you-get__web_item_six:
Settting up rewards to each child  individually
or for the whole family.
what-you-get__web_item_seven:
View insights on the whole family or
on each child individually.
what-you-get__app_item_four:
Receive end-of-period awards according
to the child's behavior during the period.
what-you-get__app_item_five: Watch the children's improvement by subject.
what-you-get__app_item_six:
Work on subjects you would like to work on
with each child individually.
what-you-get__app_item_seven:
Encourage your child to continue to behave well
by automatic bonuses.
families__subtitle:
We are currently working on a different version of Mimi that will be especially suitable for families. 
Feel free to put your email on the waiting list and you will be the first to know as soon as we start Mimi for families!
families__sucess_title: We recived your email, We will update you soon!
